answers.answer: Hi Wise,How old are you?You have mentioned that you have spinal disc pathology in the form of bulging disc at your lower back. This explains you the symptoms of radiation of pain from your legs to hips.There are only few possibilities prominent among them is your pathology of bulging disc causing such symptoms.The other possibility could be local neuromuscular injury and hence related inflammatory symptoms.The symptoms also sounds like you have neuropathy which could be due diabetes, pre-diabetes, chronic diseases, any endocrine and cardiac abnormality.You need to visit a neurologist to rule out neurological causes and come closer to diagnosis with help of examination and imaging studies.Keep me informed if you have any queries.Bye.
